column4: well just now 20 mins before i have login to my root user with sudo -s and then password then i try to change my account password with this command <passwd> <--- and it shows me a result you password hav been successfully updated

but when i try to login with new password in root user i am unable to log in it ? but with the old password it works but when i used this command sudo passwd  <---- and changes my password  and when i try to login root user i just type sudo -i it automatically take me to root user without asking my password new or old password why ?
i want's to know the exact diffrence between this 2 comands and whats going inside my system
